summary: Makes the Redoran Guards of Raven Rock wear the armor purposefully named after them.
descriptionHtml:
Ever wondered why the Redoran Guards in Vanilla Dragonborn DLC wears Bonemold Pauldron Armor when there is a Bonemold Guard Armor that was made specifically for THEM? Captain Veleth was the only one wearing this Bonemold variant, but not his subordinates. And being an immersive player (did I say it right?), that one small detail bugged the hell out of me. Soooo, here it is: a mini mod that makes them wear the proper armor.

BTW, this is my first mod in the nexus. Also, if this has already been done, or made a similar mod yourself, feel free to ignore this mod. 

just install with NMM. Make sure you\'re out of Solstheim when installing, else the armors won\'t load immediately.

update 02/18/2013: Renamed to \"Gah-Julan Bonemold Armor\" as a tribute to House Redoran.
author: XG417
